'Immaculate Machine' was a Canadian indie pop band from Victoria, British
Columbia, active from 2003 to
2011. [http://exclaim.ca/News/immaculate_machine_call_it_day "Immaculate
Machine Call It a Day"]. [[Exclaim!]], February 11, 2011.

The band's name is taken from the lyrics of "One-Trick Pony" from the album [[One-
Trick Pony (album)|One-Trick Pony]] by Paul Simon.
categories: Musical groups from Victoria, British Columbia
